scripts.build:create-demo-definition: npm run build && ncc build lib/actions/create-demo-definition.js -o dist/create-demo-definition --source-map
scripts.build:extract-demo-definition: npm run build && ncc build lib/actions/extract-demo-definition.js -o dist/extract-demo-definition --source-map
scripts.build:deactivate-demo-definition: npm run build && ncc build lib/actions/deactivate-demo-definition.js -o dist/deactivate-demo-definition --source-map
scripts.build:demo-repository-secrets: npm run build && ncc build lib/actions/demo-repository-secrets.js -o dist/demo-repository-secrets --source-map
scripts.package: npm run build:create-demo-definition && npm run build:demo-repository-secrets && npm run build:extract-demo-definition && npm run build:deactivate-demo-definition
